title: NA passes resolution to declare chambers in SB building as national museum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 08 (APP): The National Assembly on Wednesday passed a resolution to declare all NA chambers in the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP) Islamabad Building as a national museum.
The resolution was moved in the House by Muttahida Qaumi Movement-Pakistanâ€™s Sabir Hussain Qaimkhani.
The resolution said the government should take immediate steps to declare all National Assembly chambers in the SBP Islamabad building as a national museum.
